message.name: ERR_TASKALLOCATIONBLOCKING_XRV_BLOCKING_TIME_PERIODS_CANNOT_OVERLAP
message.locale: New task allocation block records cannot overlap with current or pending task allocation blocks. Please enter a new time period that does not overlap with another task allocation block record.

message.name: ERR_TASKALLOCATIONBLOCKING_XRV_REDIRECTION_TIME_PERIODS_CANNOT_OVERLAP
message.locale: New task allocation block records cannot overlap with current or pending task redirections. Please enter a new time period that does not overlap with a task redirection record.
